DOC.brief_summary: This will be a descriptive study using patients from the Urogynecology and Urology University of South Florida Clinics and Urology clinic at Tampa General Hospital Healthpark on 30th Street to analyze the impact of demographics on the definition of being sexually active. It is believed one's demographics influence their definition of being sexually active.
DOC.criteria: Men and Women >18 who seek urogynecological/urological treatment English speaking Willing and able to provide written and informed consent Men and Women <18 Not a patient at the appropriate Urogynecological and Urology clinics NonEnglish speaking Unable or unwilling to provide written and informed consent
